<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>[[Image:Boundingbox.jpg|right|200px]] Returns a bounding box of given object in model coordinate space, adjusted according to destruction/animation of an object. This command is rather generous on the size estimation, for more precise coordinates use [[boundingBoxReal]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> In <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part></template> The output of both syntaxes got extended to include bounding sphere diameter. See also [[sizeOf]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[boundingBox]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - An array with the extreme points of the model in format [[PositionRelative]], as well as bounding box sphere diameter.<br>Format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[xmin, ymin, zmin], [xmax, ymax, zmax], boundingSphereDiameter].

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> clippingType [[boundingBox]] object <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> clippingType: [[Number]] - Clipping type could be:
* 0 - ClipVisual (could significantly reduce the size of bounding boxes on buildings)
* 1 - ClipShadow
* 2 - ClipGeometry
* 3 - ClipGeneral (Default, the same type that is used in main syntax)

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name> r2 </name>=<value> [[Array]] - An array with the extreme points of the model bounding box in format [[PositionRelative]], as well as bounding box sphere diameter.<br>Format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[xmin, ymin, zmin], [xmax, ymax, zmax], boundingSphereDiameter].

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _box = [[boundingBox]] _abrams;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] (0 [[boundingBox]] [[cursorObject]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sizeOf]], [[boundingBoxReal]], [[boundingCenter]] [[BIS_fnc_boundingBoxDimensions]]
